body_html: Yet another reason to follow numpy: other functions that we want to implement return nonzero-style formatting (e.g. where with a single parameter) and we will need to call out this difference in multiple places.
body_text: Yet another reason to follow numpy: other functions that we want to implement return nonzero-style formatting (e.g. where with a single parameter) and we will need to call out this difference in multiple places.
body: Yet another reason to follow numpy: other functions that we want to implement return nonzero-style formatting (e.g. `where` with a single parameter) and we will need to call out this difference in multiple places.
